thread.title: 'Late Show' Imagines Candidate Donald Trump Running Against President Donald Trump
thread.title_full: 'Late Show' Imagines Candidate Donald Trump Running Against President Donald Trump

author: Lee Moran
title: 'Late Show' Imagines Candidate Donald Trump Running Against President Donald Trump
text: 'Late Show' Imagines Candidate Donald Trump Running Against   “This guy plays more golf than people on the PGA tour." By Lee Moran How would candidate Donald Trump campaign against his presidential self? The “ Late Show ” imagined such a scenario on Friday, by overlaying audio of some of the verbal attacks Trump made on former   over footage of Trump from the last four weeks. “This guy plays more golf than people on the PGA tour,” quipped candidate Trump, while photographs of the president on the green flashed up on screen.
